# Spell Storing, Major
## Overview
**Aura** strong evocation; **CL** 17th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 200,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

As the *[[Spell Storing, Minor (Ring)|minor ring of spell storing]]**,* except it holds up to 10 levels of spells.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Imbue With Spell Ability (Spell)|imbue with spell ability]]*

**Cost** 100,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
